TopicTitle: A new way to navigate the parts.

Articles.Content:
When you run multiple mods like, KW Rocketry, NovaPunch, B9 Aerospace, It gets over whelming to navigate the pages. Instead of arrows, why not a list of numbers on the top? Ex. Page1 Page2 Page3, and so on. Using the arrows takes a little long and gets frustrating. Directly jumping to a certain page would safe time and hassle.

What do you think?

This is a fairly old suggestion, having new ways to navigate the parts menu. I'm not sure what the devs have planned in that area, but they're probably going to tweak or fully redesign a lot of the UI elements. Maybe.

Either way, there's mods that let you sort, group and organize your parts as you see fit. I used one of 'em for a short while, though I forget which. It was pretty good stuff.
I don't like those mods, they take a little too long to navigate around it. The page number thing would be faster and I have yet to see any mods that do that
